description: This course teaches students how to build apps for the Apple Watch. Students will build several real world watch apps and will be provided with sample projects and code for them to follow along with. This course uses Xcode and Swift to teach students how to create Apple Watch apps for the new Apple Watch OS. Students who have worked with Xcode and Swift before will be able to take this course without any issues or knowledge gaps. The course is structured as step by step video tutorials with sample source code provided as well so the sudent can follow along.
title: Learn To Build Apps For The Apple Watch
